row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &MANDANTEN# = '01,02,20,21,54' :SET &AUS_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'AuslPflege' :SET &VERARBEITUNG_AUSL# = 'L+' :SET &AUSLOESERTYP# = '1787,1788' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&AUS_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# MANDANT = &MANDANTEN# BESCHREIBUNG = &AUS_BESCHREIBUNG# VERARBEITUNG = &VERARBEITUNG_AUSL# AUSLOESERTYP = &AUSLOESERTYP# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo 'Test &PROGRAM# &TS#' > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_1.out :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
